籤詩版本二:
Siphethe ihashe kwaye sibambe isabhokhwe, siza ngqo apha, isiqingatha sisengozini kunye nesiqingatha sentlekele.
Ingathi yindlu etshiswe ngumlilo, xa izulu liwile imvula iyijike ibe luthuthu, ndinecebo.
詩意:
Le hexagram imele isiqingatha sosizi kunye nesiqingatha sovuyo.
Kucetyiswa ukwenza okulungileyo kwinto yonke.
解曰: Umsebenzi wobomi bonke. Ungakhathali ngokulungileyo nokubi. Amakhamandela awexeshana. Ukuba nenzondo kuyazenzekela.
